programme.desc: The tropical island of Antigua.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways
programme.desc: Lazing the day away on a white sand beach in the Philippines as the sun gently sets on the horizon.

programme.title: Crackling Fire
programme.desc: The elegance and warmth of a crackling fire in Entrelacs, Quebec.

programme.title: Spring Poppy Field
programme.desc: A vibrant spring field of poppies after a super-bloom, as seen in California's Antelope Valley.

programme.title: Thermal Wonderland: New Zealand
programme.desc: Free from rabbit holes but still full of magic, Waiotapu Thermal Wonderland has an impressive geothermal landscape.

programme.title: Lover's Island & Entalula Beach
programme.desc: Powder-white beaches and shimmering waters.

programme.title: Moalboal White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Exploring the Basdaku Beach.

programme.title: Best of Inspiring Forest Trail
programme.desc: In the heart of the Laurentians.

programme.title: Pantai Ngopet: Indonesia
programme.desc: Discover the awe-inspiring waters of Indonesia with a tour of various vacation-worthy spots.

programme.title: Ulun Danu Temple: Indonesia
programme.desc: The tranquility of an ancient temple and the serene views of its surrounding waters.

programme.title: Ulun Danu Temple: Indonesia
programme.desc: The tranquility of an ancient temple and the serene views of its surrounding waters.

programme.title: Summer in Yellowstone
programme.desc: Capturing the beauty of America's Yellowstone National Park while illuminating the landscape and scenery of the region.

programme.title: Sunrise Meditation
programme.desc: Easimg into the day with the sound of lapping waves and breathtaking beaches from around the world.

programme.title: Inspiring Sights
programme.desc: Visit the medieval town of Menton on the French Cote d'Azur, where the sun glistens on the iridescent water.

programme.title: Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: Highlighting the abundant and varied flora and fauna that dwells underwater in several oceans around the world.

programme.title: A Day in Santorini
programme.desc: A visual journey through the coastal village of Oia, found on the far tip of Santorini Island.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: A Day in the Caribbean
programme.desc: The tropical island of Antigua.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: Fly Over Earth
programme.desc: Footage of scenic destinations.

programme.title: Fly Over Spectacular Sights: Indonesia
programme.desc: A bird's-eye view of Indonesia's spectacular scenery.

programme.title: A Day in Santorini
programme.desc: A visual journey through the coastal village of Oia, found on the far tip of Santorini Island.

programme.title: A Day on the Napali Coast
programme.desc: An ambient nature film features the spectacular sights and sounds of the legendary 11-mile Kalalau Trail on the Hawaiian island of Kauai.

programme.title: Awe Of Nature
programme.desc: A charming hut on the Playa Coson.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia, Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Da Nang this week with World Spas and take a peek into the life of the pampered few.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Burn Appetit Vienna, Austria
programme.desc: In Vienna, Jolly chances upon a Baroque palace that houses mysteries of not only the world in which we live but also of the heavens above.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka (ENG)
programme.desc: Successful actress and travel enthusiast, Indeya Passfield visits Kandy in search of rejuvenation. From the Zen at Sri Dalada Maligawa temple and nature therapy at Royal Forest Park in Uddawatekele to delectable Sri Lankan fare and relaxing massages at her resort, she finds it in every experience she has in Kandy. She also explores the local arts and crafts at the Kandyan Arts Association.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Burn Appetit Riegersberg, Austria
programme.desc: On the way to Graz from Vienna, Jolly makes an unexpected discovery: a medieval castle on a volcano, which is home to a dungeon of witches.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nagthat, India
programme.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. However, Rohan goes there with his travel buddy, Healer, looking for adventures. Their first stop is a small, mountain village, Nagthat, where the locals give them a unique welcome. As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline visits Lucy and Ardi, the ancestors of mankind, and relishes traditional Ethiopian injera in Addis Ababa, the capital of Ethiopia.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: While the rest of Japan remained isolated from the world, Fukuoka’s global flavour was concocted by centuries of trade with its Asian neighbours. Adventurers, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccon Chronicles Eternal Love in Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Gondar, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline learns about the history of Ethiopia at the Gondar Castle, and goes on to explore the stunning, rock-hewn Lalibela churches.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccon Chronicles The Ballad of Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Axum, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline explores the ruins of Aksum, the heart of ancient Ethiopia. Next, she tries the Ethiopian coffee ceremony and hyena feeding in Harar.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccon Chronicles One Flew Over Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Axum, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline explores the ruins of Aksum, the heart of ancient Ethiopia. Next, she tries the Ethiopian coffee ceremony and hyena feeding in Harar.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Gondar, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline learns about the history of Ethiopia at the Gondar Castle, and goes on to explore the stunning, rock-hewn Lalibela churches.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Axum, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline explores the ruins of Aksum, the heart of ancient Ethiopia. Next, she tries the Ethiopian coffee ceremony and hyena feeding in Harar.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Off The Grid Omo Valley, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Omo Valley, Emeline visits the Hamer, Karo and Dassanach tribes, and learns about their distinct culture and curious traditions.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Among Japan’s best kept secrets is its very own Venice with an oriental flavour to it. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit this hidden gem, and learn a little about Kyushu’s history and Samurai, the legendary Japanese warriors. They also witness an enchanting garden, that is the perfect combination of the creativity of nature and human beings.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccon Chronicles Uncharted Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Off The Grid Omo Valley, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Omo Valley, Emeline visits the Hamer, Karo and Dassanach tribes, and learns about their distinct culture and curious traditions.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Burn Appetit Vienna, Austria
programme.desc: In Vienna, Jolly chances upon a Baroque palace that houses mysteries of not only the world in which we live but also of the heavens above.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia, Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Da Nang this week with World Spas and take a peek into the life of the pampered few.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Burn Appetit Riegersberg, Austria
programme.desc: On the way to Graz from Vienna, Jolly makes an unexpected discovery: a medieval castle on a volcano, which is home to a dungeon of witches.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Unwind Earl's Regency, Sri Lanka (ENG)
programme.desc: Successful actress and travel enthusiast, Indeya Passfield visits Kandy in search of rejuvenation. From the Zen at Sri Dalada Maligawa temple and nature therapy at Royal Forest Park in Uddawatekele to delectable Sri Lankan fare and relaxing massages at her resort, she finds it in every experience she has in Kandy. She also explores the local arts and crafts at the Kandyan Arts Association.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccon Chronicles Eternal Love in Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: While the rest of Japan remained isolated from the world, Fukuoka’s global flavour was concocted by centuries of trade with its Asian neighbours. Adventurers, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 City Breaks Belfast, Ireland
programme.desc: Join our host in Belfast, as she explores a city dotted with Victorian buildings to vibrant streets. Starting from City hall to visiting RMS Titanic Museum in this episode of City Breaks.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
programme.desc: Emeline visits Lucy and Ardi, the ancestors of mankind, and relishes traditional Ethiopian injera in Addis Ababa, the capital of Ethiopia.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nagthat, India
programme.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. However, Rohan goes there with his travel buddy, Healer, looking for adventures. Their first stop is a small, mountain village, Nagthat, where the locals give them a unique welcome. As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: The Moroccon Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccon Chronicles The Ballad of Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan Tree, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Off The Grid Jinka, Ethiopia
programme.desc: In Jinka, Emeline visits the Mursi and other tribes, and learns about their distinct cultures and curious traditions.

programme.title: How chaos ultimately decided the final podium lineup - F1 British GP Review
programme.desc: The British Grand Prix didn’t disappoint, with a dream victory for Lando Norris, beating teammate Oscar Piastri after the Australian picked up a 10-second penalty for erratic driving behind the Safety Car. But the star of the show was Sauber’s Nico Hulkenberg, who after 15 years and 239 starts in Formula 1, finally got his first podium finish. Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with Jake Boxall-Legge and Ronald Vording to discuss all the action and news from Silverstone. Including Hulk's "incredible" podium, whether Piastri should have been penalised, Max Verstappen's spin from second and the persistent rumours over his future, and Mohammed Ben Sulayem's challenger for...

programme.title: The 10 Best British F1 Drivers Of All Time
programme.desc: With the 70th Anniversary Grand Prix taking place at Silverstone this weekend, we thought we’d take a look at some of the greatest F1 drivers to ever come out of Great Britain.

programme.title: When Indycar Conquered F1 - Monzanapolis
programme.desc: Using the 2.6 mile oval circuit at Monza, Indycar and Formula 1 came together in the 1950's for an epic race showdown, but even with Ferrari and Jaguar leading the pack for the European teams, they were still outpaced by the Americans. In the latest episode in our “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when Indycar conquered F1.

programme.title: The Most Dominant Race Win In Modern F1
programme.desc: Winning margins in Formula 1 are usually measured in seconds. Occasionally, in a wet race, we get a race won by more than a minute. But sometimes we’ve needed another unit of measurement altogether. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when Damon Hill won by two laps…

programme.title: 2025 Belcar - Round 2: Spa-Francorchamps
programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from Spa-Francorchamps, the second round of the 2025 Belcar Endurance Championship.

programme.title: ELMS 2025: Round 3 - Imola Highlights
programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the third round of the European Le Mans Series at Imola.

programme.title: What it Takes to be an F1 World Champion - Exclusive Interview with Damon Hill
programme.desc: Joining James Allen on the podcast this week is Damon Hill, 1996 F1 World Champion and broadcaster, whilst he trains for his Neuro UK Fundraiser, cycling the 2024 L'Etape du Tour event in France. The pair discuss everything from the upcoming 2024 Silverstone Grand Prix, what it's like for British drivers to win their home race, engaging with F1's fanbase and what it takes to become an F1 World Champion. programme.title: Round 3: Interlagos - Race 2 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 2 of the third round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo José Carlos Pace.

programme.title: Regrets, Family and Ducati: A Deep-Dive with MotoGP's Marc Marquez
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Uri Puigdemont sits down with eight-time World Champion and newest Ducati MotoGP rider, Marc Marquez. In it, Marc talks about his career-defining switch from Honda to Ducati in 2023, the relationship between himself and brother Alex as they both compete for the sport’s greatest prize, how his family are dealing with the fights on-track, and how he’s getting along with new teammate Francesco Bagnaia. There’s also a deep-dive into Marquez’s mentality, from the recent chaos of that aborted start in Austin, the crash that ended his perfect start to 2025, and what Marc would tell his 18 year old self, nearly 15 years after his first World Championship in the 125cc...

programme.title: The Valentino Rossi Story
programme.desc: An extraordinary personality, global popularity, legendary victory celebrations, and nine motorcycle world championship titles - those are the words to describe Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Rossi's Fast Food Genius - VR46's Executive Chef Spills the Beans
programme.desc: Ever wandered what it might be like to feed a MotoGP team? We sat down with Michele Quarenghi, chef for the Pertamina Enduro VR46 Racing Team, to get a behind the scenes look at being a travelling chef in Motorsport. We ask Michele just what it takes to feed as many as 1,300 people across a race weekend, how you get into a racing paddock in the first place, the challenges of sourcing ingredients in different countries, and of course, what it's like to cook for the legend that is Valentino Rossi, and what is favourite meal is!

programme.title: Race Rewind: NASCAR Cup Series at Sonoma Raceway
programme.desc: Shane van Gisbergen, Chase Briscoe and the entire NASCAR Cup Series field at Sonoma delivered Sunday, with plenty of spin outs, wrecks and drama. Enjoy this replay of a Cup Series race that was great from start to finish.

programme.title: Dakar 1986
programme.desc: All the action from the classic Dakar Rally in 1986, from Duke Video.

programme.title: F1's Fiercest Rivalries with Karun Chandhok
programme.desc: From the personal insults of Nigel Mansell vs Nelson Piquet, the short but fiery feud between Ayrton Senna and Michael Schumacher, to a friendship turned sour between Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton, they’re all featured here. But what pair takes the Number 1 spot? Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with former driver and Sky Sports F1 broadcaster Karun Chandhok to debate who they think are the Top 10 greatest rivalries in the sport’s 75-year history. Let us know who you think F1’s greatest rivalry was in the comments, and check back soon for a new series of F1 Top 10 Podcasts!

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.title: Spa Classic 2024
programme.desc: Catch up on all the highlights from the 2024 Spa Classic.

programme.title: WSBK - Round 7: Donington Park RELIVE
programme.desc: Take a look at all of the highlights from Round 7 of the 2025 WorldSBK championship at Donington Park Circuit.

programme.title: Lost F1 Teams: Prodrive
programme.desc: Lost F1 Teams: Prodrive

programme.title: Lost F1 Teams: Epsilon Euskadi
programme.desc: Based in the Basque Country region of Spain, Epsilon set sights on becoming the first Spanish F1 team with an entry for the 2010 season...but they never made it to the grid. Here's why.

programme.title: Why Lola Should've Made It Onto The 2010 F1 Grid
programme.desc: Founded in 1958 by Eric Broadley, Lola can trace its history in F1 back to 1962, supplying its Mk4 chassis to Reg Parnell’s privateer team, fielding British duo John Surtees and Roy Salvadori as its driving line-up. Having developed a relationship with Surtees in that time, Broadley returned to F1 to pen the works Honda team’s RA300 chassis in 1967, beginning a course of sporadic involvement over the next few decades.

programme.title: Make F1 Great Again: The US F1 Team That Never Made It Into Formula 1
programme.desc: The deadlock of American manufacturers entering F1 - having enjoyed a glut in the ‘60s and ‘70s with Eagle, Penske and, erm, Scarab – looked to have been broken sooner amid F1’s new-team tender process. Sensing an opportunity to increase F1’s exposure in America, the FIA admitted the US F1 team to the 2010 grid in its overtures to hand the Star-Spangled Banner its first exposure on the constructors’ list for nearly quarter of a decade. Set up by engineer Ken Anderson, a veteran of IndyCar – heading up the design of the G-Force car that took to the IRL’s cast of oval circuits - and ex-Williams team manager Peter Windsor, the US F1 project made its home in Charlotte, North Carolina, from...

programme.title: The Valentino Rossi Story
programme.desc: An extraordinary personality, global popularity, legendary victory celebrations, and nine motorcycle world championship titles - those are the words to describe Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Rossi's Fast Food Genius - VR46's Executive Chef Spills the Beans
programme.desc: Ever wandered what it might be like to feed a MotoGP team? We sat down with Michele Quarenghi, chef for the Pertamina Enduro VR46 Racing Team, to get a behind the scenes look at being a travelling chef in Motorsport. We ask Michele just what it takes to feed as many as 1,300 people across a race weekend, how you get into a racing paddock in the first place, the challenges of sourcing ingredients in different countries, and of course, what it's like to cook for the legend that is Valentino Rossi, and what is favourite meal is!

programme.title: Race Rewind: NASCAR Cup Series at Sonoma Raceway
programme.desc: Shane van Gisbergen, Chase Briscoe and the entire NASCAR Cup Series field at Sonoma delivered Sunday, with plenty of spin outs, wrecks and drama. Enjoy this replay of a Cup Series race that was great from start to finish.

programme.title: F1's Fiercest Rivalries with Karun Chandhok
programme.desc: From the personal insults of Nigel Mansell vs Nelson Piquet, the short but fiery feud between Ayrton Senna and Michael Schumacher, to a friendship turned sour between Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton, they’re all featured here. But what pair takes the Number 1 spot? Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with former driver and Sky Sports F1 broadcaster Karun Chandhok to debate who they think are the Top 10 greatest rivalries in the sport’s 75-year history. programme.title: Why Lola Should've Made It Onto The 2010 F1 Grid

programme.title: WOF 2025 #19: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #20: ABSA Cape Epic Series - Episode 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is known as one of the toughest mountain bike stage races in the world and pushes riders to their physical and mental limits. The first three stages set the tone for the entire race.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #27: Epic Series - 4 Islands
programme.desc: The 4Islands Epic is a legendary stage race as part of the Epic Series, which takes place on the Croatian islands of the Kvarner region - Lošinj, Cres, Krk and occasionally Rab - and offers around 260 km and 5,600 vertical meters over five days (prologue + four stages).

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: Salomon Golden Trails - Series
programme.desc: Welcome to this week´s episode of World of Freesports. Today we travel to the Canary Islands – to El Hiero, Spain. We will be witnessing one of the hardest and most iconic trail running events in Europe – the Salomon Golden Trail.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2022
programme.desc: 8Oropesa del Mar – Castellón (ESP), February 10th to 13th 2022It is the first big clash of the mountain bike season: a UCI Hors Catégorie 4-day stage race. The race offers spectacular mountain bike trails in close proximity to the sea!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #04 AUT
programme.desc: Fieberbrunn, (AUT), March 14th 2022The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn. It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Baldface Lodge, CAN
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #21: IWSA World Cup & My own way - Lindsey Hamm
programme.desc: In the first part, we follow the exciting action of the IWSA Wingfoil World Cup in Morocco. In the second part, the focus is on the American climber Lindsey Hamm, who presents an intimate portrait of her life.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #22: Swatch Nines – Skate & Surf
programme.desc: The show offers an exciting insight into the first Swatch Nines event, which took place in October 2024 in Waco Surf, Texas. The three-day event emphasized creativity and collaboration over rankings and scores.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: WOF 2025 #24: Formula Wing European Championships 2025
programme.desc: Formula Wing European Championships: This year's event brought together the fastest and most experienced wingfoil riders from across Europe to battle it out for victory on the stunning waters of Urla in Turkey.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Athlete Profile - Aurelien Routens
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France was vice world champion at the Freeride World Tour 2013 and has made a name for himself with his outstanding web series "Carpe Diem". In our 26-minute portrait, the 36-year-old talks about his life as a snowboard professional.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Men
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #05 SUI
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2022 - Women
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: 10 Years Laax Open
programme.desc: The Laax Open is one of the most prestigious snowboard events, celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. Against the backdrop of the Swiss Alps, the Laax Open offers a unique blend of energetic sport and lively après-ski culture.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.
